name: CI/Integration Test (Free)

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: [main, dev]
  push:
    branches: [main, dev]
jobs:
  integration-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # 1. Thiết lập Java
      - name: Set up JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v3
        with:
          java-version: '17'
          distribution: 'adopt'

      # 2. Build ứng dụng Java (Tạo JAR)
      - name: Build with Maven
        run: mvn clean install -DskipTests || { echo "Maven build failed"; exit 1; }

      # 3. Build Docker Image cho ứng dụng Java (Sử dụng Dockerfile đã sửa COPY target/*.jar)
      - name: Build Java App Docker Image
        run: docker build -t my-java-app:latest . -f Dockerfile || { echo "Docker build failed"; exit 1; }

      # 4. Start services (Java App + MongoDB)
      - name: Start services (Java App + MongoDB)
        run: |
          # Verify Docker Compose installation
          docker-compose --version || { echo "Docker Compose not installed or not found"; exit 1; }

          # Check Docker service status
          sudo systemctl status docker || { echo "Docker service is not running"; exit 1; }

          # Start the services
          docker-compose up -d || { echo "Docker Compose failed"; exit 1; }

      # 5. Check Logs and Exit Codes
      - name: Check Application Logs
        run: |
          CONTAINER_NAME="java_app_test"
          docker logs $CONTAINER_NAME || { echo "Failed to retrieve logs for $CONTAINER_NAME"; exit 1; }
          docker logs mongodb || { echo "Failed to retrieve MongoDB logs"; exit 1; }
      # BƯỚC CẦN DI CHUYỂN RA NGOÀI ĐỂ CÙNG CẤP VỚI CÁC BƯỚC KHÁC
      - name: Check Java Application Logs
        run: |
          sleep 5
          CONTAINER_NAME="java_app_test"
          echo "--- CHECKING $CONTAINER_NAME LOGS ---"
          docker logs $CONTAINER_NAME
          EXIT_CODE=$(docker inspect --format='{{.State.ExitCode}}' $CONTAINER_NAME 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          echo "Container Exit Code: $EXIT_CODE"
          if [ "$EXIT_CODE" != "0" ] && [ "$EXIT_CODE" != "N/A" ]; then
             echo "--- ❌ ERROR: JAVA CONTAINER CRASHED ---"
             exit 1
          fi
          echo "--------------------------------"
      # 5. Health Check
      - name: Wait for Java Application Health Check
        run: |
          APP_URL="http://localhost:8080/"
          for i in $(seq 1 20); do
            STATUS_CODE=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" -X GET $APP_URL)
            if [ "$STATUS_CODE" -eq 200 ] || [ "$STATUS_CODE" -eq 204 ]; then
              echo "✅ App is UP!"
              exit 0
            fi
            echo "Waiting for $APP_URL... Current Status Code: $STATUS_CODE"
            sleep 5
          done
          echo "❌ App failed to start."
          exit 1
      # 6. Dọn dẹp (ĐÃ SỬA CÚ PHÁP)
      - name: Stop services
        if: always()
        run: docker compose down || { echo "Docker compose down failed"; exit 1; }
